channel.title: Saber Feedback 2020 (and a few months more) in review
channel.description:
If you've been following my progress with Saber Feedback, you might enjoy reading the summary of my first 12 months post-acquisition.
https://saberfeedback.com/blog/saber-feedback-year-in-review-2020/
As this is on Saber Feedback's own website, it is a bit more "marketing"-ish compared to the details that I occasionally share on the podcast. :slight_smile:

item.title: Saber Feedback 2020 (and a few months more) in review
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
If you’ve been following my progress with Saber Feedback, you might enjoy reading the summary of my first 12 months post-acquisition.

Saber Feedback

Saber Feedback 2020 (and a few months more) in review

April seems late for a yearly report. But April 1st marks one year since I acquired Saber Feedback. So actually the report is quite timely. In that time we've had five major achievements and two significant challenges.

As this is on Saber Feedback’s own website, it is a bit more “marketing”-ish compared to the details that I occasionally share on the podcast.

Read full topic
item.source: Saber Feedback 2020 (and a few months more) in review
